Package space.sunqian.common.runtime.invoke

package space.sunqian.common.runtime.invoke
Provides unified interfaces to handle an invocable body, for example: 

 Invocable byDefault = Invocable.of(method);
 Invocable byAsm = Invocable.of(constructor, InvocationMode.ASM);

Utilities:

  • InvokeKit
Core interfaces:
  • Invocable
  • Class
    Description
    Invocable
    This interface represents an invocable entity, such as a method, constructor, function, executable task, executable scope or other similar entity.
    InvocationException
    This runtime exception is used for wrapping exceptions thrown during an invocation, such as an exception during the execution of Invocable.invoke(Object, Object...).
    InvocationMode
    This enum indicates the way to implement Invocable.
    InvokeKit
    Utilities for Invocable, MethodHandle and other invocation related.
